trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The storm crow's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
text: While in sunlight, the malphas has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Night Terror (1/round)
text: As a bonus action immediately after making a successful melee attack, a malphas storm crow can cast magic missile through his or her sword at the same target.

trait.name: Swordtrained
text: Malphas are trained from youth in combat. They are proficient with all martial melee and ranged weapons.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The malphas makes three longsword attacks.

action.name: Longsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Shadow Call
text: A malphas can cast magic missile as a reaction when it is hit by a ranged weapon attack.
